mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard (icategory, title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (${icategory}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, ${iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM freeboard WHERE isdel = 0 ORDER BY iboard DESC
SELECT * FROM freeboard WHERE isdel = 0 AND iboard = ${iboard}

SELECT (SELECT iboard FROM freeboard WHERE isdel = 0 AND iboard < ${iboard} ORDER BY iboard LIMIT 1) AS previboard, (SELECT iboard FROM freeboard WHERE isdel = 0 AND iboard > ${iboard} ORDER BY iboard LIMIT 1) AS nextiboard
